summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6669 for the improvement of tillicum Rd. S.W. Cloverdale St. to 46th Ave. S.W.; and certain other streets, avenues and an alley; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ord. No. 105446, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said Roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
